sentence: J. D. Vance may be running aground in Ohio According to some internal polling which made its way into the public domain, it looks like Josh Mandel has the upper hand in the Ohio GOP Senate primary over J. D. Vance.
author: Scott McKay
title: Five Quick Things: Why Aren’t Black Politicians Crushing Biden Over Inflation?

author: David Smith
title: The strange Republican world where the big lie lives on and Trump is fighting to save democracy

sentence: The report notes that Freeman's belief of election fraud was amplified in a speech by Josh Mandel, who is seeking Ohio's GOP U.S. Senate nomination, and told the crowd, "We have Democrats who think it’s OK to cheat in elections, and I would submit to you that one of the most important fights of our day is to stop the cheating from the left...
author: Tom Boggioni
title: Trump supporters complain the Capitol riot gets 'bad press' at CPAC's 'parallel universe'
